content.text: Quellor was a planet in the Colonies.
Quellor joined the Galactic Republic early in its history, sometime between 25,000 BBY and 22,000 BBY.
The planet didn't secede during the Clone Wars.

It was on Quellor that several peaceful, anti-Imperial rallies were held following the Battle of Yavin. At one such rally, sector Moff Toggan ordered his legion of stormtroopers to keep the peace and ensure the crowd did not get out of hand. Though Toggan specifically ordered his troops to hold their fire unless ordered otherwise, they opened fire on the protestors when they burned an effigy of the Galactic Emperor Palpatine. Every single member of the rally was killed.
By 4 ABY, Quellor had become an Imperial fortress world. It was still under Imperial control in 7 ABY.
New Republic forces fleeing the Yuuzhan Vong invasion of Gyndine retreated to Quellor. The Yuuzhan Vong would later attack and capture the planet itself.

elements.text: Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook
